(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (EX there))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT another) (NN means))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (NN trickery)))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT that))
          (S
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (ADJP
                (ADJP
                  (NP (DT a) (RB little))
                  (RBR more) (JJ subtle))
                (SBAR
                  (WHPP (IN of)
                    (WHNP (WDT which)))
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP you))

                      (ADVP (RB only))
                      (VP (VB spot)
                        (SBAR (IN if)
                          (S
                            (NP (PRP you))
                            (ADVP (RB really))

    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (SINV
    (NP (CD One) (JJ such) (NNP Durian) (NN seller))
    (VP (VBN tried)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB pull)
            (NP
              (NP (DT this) (NN one))
              (PP (IN on)
                (NP (PRP me))))
            (PP
              (ADVP (RB recently))
              (IN by)
              (S
                (VP (VBG trying)
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB sell)
                        (S
                          (NP (PRP me))
                          (NP
                            (NP (DT a) (NNP Mao) (NNP Shan) (NNP Wang))
                            (PP (IN for)
                              (NP (NNP $)))))))))))))))))

    (NP

      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (MD can)
              (ADVP (RB easily))

(ROOT
  (S (IN so)
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB end)
        (PRT (RP up))
        (S
          (VP (VBG paying)
            (ADVP
              (ADVP
                (NP (DT a) (RB bit))
                (RBR more))
              (PP (IN for)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT a) (NN fruit))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (DT the) (JJ same) (NN size))))))
            (PP (IN as)
              (NP (DT the) (NN D101)))))))
    (. .)))
